attributes.action: High Speed Rail to follow MOTORWAYS
attributes.additional_details: Build the HS network on motorways. I fully support the introduction of HS2 and HS3 and HS4? and start reducing polluting cars so I propose that the HS routes be built either on or beside motorways after all they go to where the trains should be going. Connection from the out of city HS stations should be with trams as the French TGV network does.
